comments.comments_text: Lorenzo Pellegrini (AS Roma) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.

comments.comments_text: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety. Good work from Atalanta as they win a corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Alejandro Gomez ([TEAM]) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety. Good work from [TEAM] as they win a corner.

comments.comments_text: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Alejandro Gomez ([TEAM]) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.

comments.comments_text: Diego Perotti (AS Roma) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Diego Perotti (AS Roma) is cleared by the defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is cleared by the defence.

comments.comments_text: Andreas Cornelius (Atalanta) finds himself in a great position after receiving a precise pass inside the box and sends the ball beyond the goalkeeper! His effort went into the bottom left corner, off the post.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) finds himself in a great position after receiving a precise pass inside the box and sends the ball beyond the goalkeeper! His effort went into the bottom left corner, off the post.

comments.comments_text: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) whips in the corner, but one of the defending players gets a head on it and intercepts.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Alejandro Gomez ([TEAM]) whips in the corner, but one of the defending players gets a head on it and intercepts.

comments.comments_text: Marten de Roon (Atalanta) received a pass and blasted a beautiful rocket of a shot from just outside the penalty area into the bottom right corner. He was given an ovation. Excellent finish.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) received a pass and blasted a beautiful rocket of a shot from just outside the penalty area into the bottom right corner. He was given an ovation. Excellent finish.

comments.comments_text: Marco Guida shows a yellow card to Marten de Roon (Atalanta) for a tough tackle.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [REFEREE] shows a yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for a tough tackle.

comments.comments_text: Mattia Caldara (Atalanta) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Marco Guida didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. [REFEREE] didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

comments.comments_text: The corner from Josip Ilicic (Atalanta) is cleared away by the defence.
